4 bool GoalChecker::isGoalConsiderable(const geometry_msgs::TransformStamped &pose) const {
5  if (not current_position_.has_value()) {
6  return true;
7  }
8 
9  auto [new_position, new_quaternion] = Converter::convertToTfPair(pose);
10  auto [old_position, old_quaternion] = Converter::convertToTfPair(current_position_.value());
11 
12  double dist = tf2::tf2Distance(old_position, new_position);
13  double angle_in_radian = tf2::angle(old_quaternion, new_quaternion);
14  double angle_in_degrees = angle_in_radian * 180.0 / M_PI;
15 
16  bool isDistConsidirable = dist > range_diff_to_set_new_pose_;
17  bool isAngleConsidirable = angle_in_radian > angle_diff_to_set_new_pose_;
18 
19  return (isDistConsidirable || isAngleConsidirable) ? true : false;
20 }
